roleset.name: unmarried, romantically unattached

example.name: arg1
example.text: If i m single yeah sure , attached no way .

roleset.name: individual instance

role.descr: aspect of arg1 that is singular

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

example.name: both args
example.text: The surety, at least, assumed no such responsibility; as to him the obligation was single in its purpose, and fully satisfied when the indictment was discharged.
